name: 100 LPH RO System with Single Membrane

specifications.pump: High-pressure pump suitable for 100 LPH flow rate
specifications.controlPanel: Basic controls with indicators for power, pump, and membrane operation
specifications.dimensions: Compact design suitable for limited space (exact dimensions may vary by manufacturer)

benefits: High Purification Capacity: Capable of producing up to 100 liters of purified water per hour, suitable for small to medium-sized businesses.
Improved Water Quality: Effectively reduces TDS, heavy metals, pesticides, and other contaminants.
Cost-Effective: Provides a high volume of purified water at a lower cost compared to bottled water.
Compact Design: Space-efficient and can be installed in areas with limited space.
Durability: Made with high-quality materials, including a stainless steel frame, ensuring longevity and resistance to corrosion.
Customizable: Can be equipped with additional features such as UV sterilization for enhanced purification.
Health Benefits: Provides safe and clean drinking water, promoting better health and well-being.
Easy Maintenance: Simple design allows for easy maintenance and replacement of filters and membranes.
Energy Efficient: Designed to consume less power while delivering optimal performance.
Environmentally Friendly: Reduces the need for plastic bottles, contributing to environmental conservation.
